> One of the most overlooked trends of the 21st century is we have too much entertainment. That's some deep insight right there. I used to watch netflix while eating alone only. I unsubscribed Jan 2022, and now I read a book on an ereader on a stand at eye level. Much more value for me and as entertaining if not more.

It's not entertainment, it's education.

The challenge now is to find and filter 'useful books' (most are not, and don't deliver on the promise on the cover).
